name: Musical memory Matcher VR
description:
VR_AudioMajong isa game a lot like Mahjong (pattern matching of tiles) except the tiles are placed around you in VR space and rather than having matching graphic patterns, they have matching musical patterns.

At the moment the game is limited to recorded audio, I'm working on a more interesting version which uses procedural generated patterns.

It only works with VIVE (as far as I know)

Depending on your skill the game shouldn't take more than, maybe, twenty minutes.
